message.content: {"given_definition_quality":78,"better_definition":"west side; the direction to the west","sentence":"西边有花。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation scene showing a clear directional sign pointing towards the west, with simple flowers blooming beside it, all under a soft, hazy sky. The tone is gentle and post-apocalyptic, but peaceful, with the focus on the sign marked '西边' and the flowers.","sentence_translation":"There are flowers on the west side."}
